text:
The Surah takes its name from the very first verse Wan shaqq al-Qamar, thereby implying that it is a Surah in which the word al-Qamar has occurred.

Period of Revelation

The incident of the shaqq-al-Qamar (splitting of the moon) that has been mentioned in it, determines its period of revelation precisely. The traditionists and commentators are agreed that this incident took place at Mina in Makkah about five years before the Holy Prophet's hijrah to Madinah.

Theme and Subject Matter

In this Surah the disbelievers of Makkah have been warned for their stubbornness which they had adopted against the invitation of the Holy Prophet (peace and blessings of Allah be upon him). The amazing and wonderful phenomenon of the splitting of the Moon was a manifest sign of the truth that the Resurrection, of which the Holy Prophet was giving them the news, could take place and that it had approached near at hand. The great sphere of the Moon had split into two distinct parts in front of their very eyes. The two parts had separated and receded so much apart from each other that to the on-lookers one part had appeared on one side of the mountain and the other on the other side of it. Then, in an instant the two had rejoined. This was a manifest proof of the truth that the system of the Universe was neither eternal nor immortal, it could be disrupted. Huge stars and Planets could split asunder, disintegrate, collide with each other, and everything that had been depicted in
the Quran In connection with the description of the details of Resurrection, could happen. Not only this : it was also a portent that the disintegration of the system of the Universe had begun and the time was near when Resurrection would take place. The Holy Prophet (peace and blessings of Allah be upon him) invited the people's attention to this event only with this object in view and asked them to mark it and be a witness to it. But the disbelievers described it as a magical illusion add persisted in their denial. For this stubbornness they have been reproached in this Surah.

At the outset it has been said: "These people neither believe in the admonition, nor learn a lesson from history, nor affirm faith after witnessing manifest signs with their eyes. Now they would believe only when Resurrection has taken place and they would be rushing out of their graves towards the Summoner on that Day."

Then, the stories of the people of Noah and of 'Ad and Thamud and of the peoples of Lot and the Pharaoh have been related briefly and they have been reminded of the terrible punishments that these nations suffered when they belied and disregarded the warnings given by the Prophets of God. After the narration of each story the refrain that has been provided is : "This Qur'an is an easy means of admonition, which if a nation takes to heart and thereby takes the Right Way, the torment that descended on the former nations could be avoided. But it would indeed be a folly if instead of heeding the admonition through this easy means, one persisted in heedlessness and disbelieved until one was overtaken by the torment itself."

Likewise, after citing admonitory precedents from the history of the former nations, the disbelievers of Makkah have been addressed and warned to this effect: "If you too adopt the same attitude and conduct for which the other nations have already been punished, why will you not be punished for it?Are you in any way a superior people that you should be treated differently from others? Or, have you received a deed of amnesty that you will not be punished for the crime for which others have been punished?And if you feel elated at your great numbers, you will soon see that these very numbers of yours are put to rout (on the battlefield) and on the Day of Resurrection you will be dealt with even more severely."

In the end, the disbelievers have been told that Allah does not need to make lengthy preparations to bring about Resurrection. No sooner does He give a simple command for it than it will take place immediately. Like everything else the Universe and mankind also have a destiny. According to this destiny everything happens at its own appointed time. It cannot be so that whenever somebody gives a challenge, Resurrection is brought about in order to convince him. If you adopt rebellion because you do not see it coming, you will only be adding to your own distress and misfortune. For your record which is being prepared by Divine agents, has not left any misdeed of yours, great or small, unrecorded.
description: The surah that opens with the unnerving, cataclysmic sign of the end of the world coming and The Moon having split apart. It takes its name from verse 1 which mentions “the moon” (qamar), that here serves as a reference to the Day of Resurrection. The surah deals mainly with the punishment dealt out to previous generations of disbelievers. These are presented as a warning to the disbelievers of Mecca, with the refrain “is there anyone who will be admonished?” running throughout the surah. Finally the treatment of the disbelievers on the Day of Judgement is contrasted to the everlasting bliss the believers will enjoy.

Albanian.verse 54:1: U afrua Çasti (Dita e Kijametit) dhe u ça Hëna!
Albanian.verse 54:2: E ata, sa herë shohin mrekulli, kthehen dhe thonë: “Magji e përhershme!”
Albanian.verse 54:3: Ata e përgënjeshtrojnë (të vërtetën) dhe pasojnë kënaqësitë e tyre, e çdo gjë, madje, është e caktuar.
Albanian.verse 54:4: Dhe, u patën ardhë atyre, me të vërtetë, lajme të cilat shpiejnë frikë,
Albanian.verse 54:5: (Kur’ani është) dijeni e përsosur – por paralajmërimi nuk u bëri dobi,
Albanian.verse 54:6: andaj, shmangu prej tyre! Në Ditën kur do t’i thërret ta kasneci (ftuesi) në diçka të tmerrshme –
Albanian.verse 54:7: ata, me sy të përulur dalin nga varret, thua se janë karkaleca të shpërndarë,
Albanian.verse 54:8: duke shpejtuar kah kasneci, e atëherë thonë mohuesit: “Kjo është ditë e vështirë!”
Albanian.verse 54:9: Para tyre (mekkasve) ka përgënjeshtruar populli i Nuhut: mohonin robin Tonë (Nuhun) dhe thonin: “I çmendur!” – dhe e pengonin (në tregimin e Shpalljes).
Albanian.verse 54:10: Dhe, iu lut Zotit të vet: “Unë jam i mundur (prej popullit tim), andaj Më ndihmo!”
Albanian.verse 54:11: Dhe, Ne ia kemi hapur dyert e qiellit me ujë (shi) të rrëmbyeshëm,
Albanian.verse 54:12: dhe, i kemi hapur burimet e tokës, e u takuan ujërat për një veprim që ka qenë i caktuar.
Albanian.verse 54:13: E, atë e bartëm (në barkën) prej dërrasave dhe gozhdave
Albanian.verse 54:14: e cila lundronte nën kujdesin Tonë, - ky ishte shpërblim për atë që ishte i përgënjeshtruar.
Albanian.verse 54:15: Dhe, Ne atë e kemi lënë si dokument, e a ka kush që këshillohet (me të)?
Albanian.verse 54:16: dhe, çfarë ka qenë dënimi Im dhe paralajmërimet e Mia?!
Albanian.verse 54:17: Në të vërtetë, Ne Kur’anin e kemi bërë të lehtë për këshillim, – e a ka kush që këshillohet (me të)?
Albanian.verse 54:18: Dhe, Adi ka përgënjeshtruar (të vërtetën), - e çfarë ka qenë dënimi Im dhe paralajmërimet e Mia?!
Albanian.verse 54:19: Ne u dërguam atyre në një ditë fatkeqe frymë të stuhieshme – të pandërprerë –
Albanian.verse 54:20: e cila i nxirrte njerëzit (prej strehimeve të tyre), thuase të ishin rrënjë të shkulura të hurmeve,
Albanian.verse 54:21: e, çfarë ka qenë dënimi Im dhe paralajmërimet e Mia?!
Albanian.verse 54:22: Në të vërtetë, Ne, Kur’anin e kemi bërë të lehtë për këshillim, - e a ka kush që këshillohet (me të)?
Albanian.verse 54:23: Dhe Themudi i përgënjeshtroi paralajmëruesit Tonë –
Albanian.verse 54:24: ata thanë: “Vallë, a ta pasojmë një njeri nga mesi ynë?! Atëherë, ne, me të vërtetë, do të ishim në rrugë të humbur dhe të çmendur.
Albanian.verse 54:25: Vallë, në mesin (e sa) prej nesh, t’i dërgohet Shpallja atij?! Jo, ai është gënjeshtar mendjemadh!”
Albanian.verse 54:26: Nesër (së shpejti), do ta dinë ata se kush është gënjeshtari mendjemadh!
Albanian.verse 54:27: Ne, do ta dërgojmë devën për t’i sprovuar, andaj priti ti ata dhe bëhu i durueshëm.
Albanian.verse 54:28: Dhe, lajmëroi ata se uji do të ndahet në mes tyre e devës, në çdo racion (shujtë) do të jetë prezent (ai që e ka rendin)!
Albanian.verse 54:29: Ata e thirrën shokun e tyre, e ai mori guximin dhe e preu atë (devën) –
Albanian.verse 54:30: e, çfarë ka qenë dënimi Im dhe paralajmërimet e Mia?!
Albanian.verse 54:31: Ne e dërguam te ta një ulurimë e ata u bënë si sana e copëtuar në pleme,
Albanian.verse 54:32: në të vërtetë, Ne Kur’anin e kemi bërë të lehtë (të kuptueshëm) pë këshillim, e a ka kush që këshillohet (me të)?
Albanian.verse 54:33: Edhe populli i Lutit i ka përgënjeshtruar paralajmërimet.
Albanian.verse 54:34: Ne, me të vërtetë, e kemi dërguar një fortunë mbi ta, pos në familjen e Lutit, këtë e shpëtuam në agim,
Albanian.verse 54:35: nga dhuntia Jonë. Ja, kështu Ne i shpërblejmë ata që falenderojnë.
Albanian.verse 54:36: Me të vërtetë, ai (Luti) i paralajmëroi ata me fuqinë e dënimit Tonë, e ata polemizuan duke i mohuar paralajmërimet.
Albanian.verse 54:37: At aprej tij i kërkuan mysafirët e tij, e Ne ua fshimë sytë atyre (i verbuam): “Shijoni dënimin Tim dhe paralajmërimin Tim!”
Albanian.verse 54:38: E, të nesërmen në mëngjes, ata i goditi dënimi i përhershëm.
Albanian.verse 54:40: Me të vërtetë, Ne Kur’anin e kemi bërë të lehtë për (ta mësuar përmendësh) këshillim, e a ka kush që këshillohet (me të)?
Albanian.verse 54:41: Edhe njerëzve të Faraonit u patën ardhur paralajmërimet,
Albanian.verse 54:42: por ata i mohuan të gjitha argumentet Tona, andaj Ne i dënuam ata, ashtu siç dënon i Plotëfuqishmi dhe i Plotëpushtetshmi.
Albanian.verse 54:43: A mos vallë mohuesit tuaj (Mekkasit) janë më të mirë se ata (që u përmendën), apo ju keni ndonjë dekret në librat e shpallur?
Albanian.verse 54:44: Apo, ata thonë: “Ne jemi grup i pathyeshëm!”
Albanian.verse 54:45: Së shpejti do të thyhet grupi dhe me të vërtetë, mëkatarët do të jenë të humbur dhe në zjarr (në jetën tjetër) është më i tmerrshëm dhe më i idhët (se dënimi në këtë botë).
Albanian.verse 54:47: Me të vërtetë, mëkatarët do të jenë të humbur dhe në zjarr (në jetën tjetër).
Albanian.verse 54:48: Ditën që do të tërhiqen (me forcë) fytyrat e tyre në zjarr (e ju thuhet): “Shijoni zjarrin e xhehennemit!”
Albanian.verse 54:49: Ne, me të vërtetë, të gjitha i kemi krijuar sipas dispozitës,
Albanian.verse 54:50: Urdhëri Ynë është vetëm një fjalë (në kryerjen e punëve – i shpejtë) sa çel e mbyllë sytë.
Albanian.verse 54:51: E, Ne, madje i kemi shkatërruar të ngjashmit me ju, - e a ka kush që këshillohet (me të)?!
Albanian.verse 54:52: E, çkado që punojnë, ato janë në librat (e veprave të njerëzve)
Albanian.verse 54:53: të gjitha, të mëdha dhe të vogla, janë shënuar në rreshta.
Albanian.verse 54:54: Ata që i druajnë Perëndisë me të vërtetë, do të jenë në kopshtet e xhennetit dhe pranë lumenjve
Albanian.verse 54:55: në vendin e kënaqësisë, te Sunduesi i Plotëfuqishëm.

Amharic.verse 54:2: ተዓምርንም ቢያዩ (ከእምነት) ይዞራሉ፡፡ (ይህ) «ዘውታሪ ድግምት ነውም» ይላሉ፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:3: አስተባበሉም፡፡ ዝንባሌዎቻቸውንም ተከተሉ፡፡ ነገርም ሁሉ (ወሰን አለው)፤ ረጊ ነው፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:4: ከዜናዎችም በእርሱ ውስጥ መገሰጥ ያለበት ነገር በእርግጥ መጣላቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:5: ሙሉ የኾነች ጥበብ (መጣቻቸው) ግን አስፈራሪዎቹ አያብቃቁም፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:6: ከነርሱም ዙር፡፡ ጠሪው (መልአክ) ወደ አስደንጋጭ ነገር የሚጠራበትን ቀን (አስታውስ)፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:7: ዓይኖቻቸው ያቀረቀሩ ኾነው፤ ፍጹም የተበተነ አንበጣ መስለው ከመቃብሮቹ ይወጣሉ፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:8: ወደ ጠሪው አንገቶቻቸውን ሳቢዎች ቸኳዮች ኾነው (ይወጣሉ)፡፡ ከሓዲዎቹ (ያን ጊዜ ምን ይላሉ?) «ይህ ብርቱ ቀን ነው» ይላሉ፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:9: ከእነርሱ በፊት የኑሕ ነገድ አስተባበለች፡፡ ባሪያችንንም (ኑሕን) አስተባበሉ፡፡ «ዕብድ ነውም» አሉ፡፡ ተገላመጠም፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:10: ጌታውንም «እኔ የተሸነፍኩ ነኝና እርዳኝ» ሲል ጠራ፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:11: ወዲያውም የሰማይን ደጃፎች በሚንቧቧ ውሃ ከፈትን፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:12: የምድርንም ምንጮች አፈነዳን፡፡ ውሃውም (የሰማዩና የምድሩ) በእርግጥ በተወሰነ ኹነታ ላይ ተገናኘ፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:13: ባለ ሳንቃዎችና ባለሚስማሮች በኾነችም ታንኳ ላይ ጫንነው፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:14: በጥበቃችን ስር ኾና ትንሻለላለች፡፡ ተክዶ ለነበረው ሰው ምንዳ (ይህንን ሠራን)፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:15: ተዓምር አድርገንም በእርግጥ ተውናት፡፡ ከተገሳጭም አልለን?
Amharic.verse 54:17: ቁርኣንንም ለመገንዘብ በእርግጥ አገራነው፡፡ ተገንዛቢም አልለን?
Amharic.verse 54:18: ዓድ አስተባበለች፡፡ ቅጣቴና ማስጠንቀቂያዎቼም እንዴት ነበሩ!
Amharic.verse 54:19: እኛ በእነርሱ ላይ ዘወትር መናጢ በኾነ ቀን በኀይል የምትንሻሻ ነፋስን ላክንባቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:20: ሰዎቹን ልክ ከሥሮቻቸው የተጎለሰሱ የዘንባባ ግንዶች መስለው (ከተደበቁበት) ትነቅላቸዋለች፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:22: ቁርኣንንም ለማስታወስ በእርግጥ አገራነው፡፡ ተገሳጭም አልለን?
Amharic.verse 54:24: «ከእኛ የኾነን አንድን ሰው እንከተለዋለን? እኛ ያን ጊዜ በስህተትና በዕብደት ውስጥ ነን» አሉ፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:25: «ከኛ መካከል በእርሱ ላይ (ብቻ) ማስገንዘቢያ (ራእይ) ተጣለለትን? አይደለም እርሱ ውሸታም ኩሩ ነው» (አሉ)፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:26: ውሸታሙ ኩሩው ማን እንደኾነ ነገ በእርግጥ ያውቃሉ፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:27: እኛ ሴት ግመልን ለእነርሱ መፈተኛ ትኾን ዘንድ ላኪዎች ነን፡፡ ተጠባበቃቸውም፡፡ ታገስም፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:28: ውሃውንም በመካከላቸው የተከፈለ መኾኑን ንገራቸው፡፡ ከውሃ የኾነ ፋንታ ሁሉ (ተረኞቹ) የሚጣዱት ነው፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:31: እኛ በእነርሱ ላይ አንዲትን ጩኸት ላክንባቸው፡፡ ወዲያውም ከበረት አጣሪ (አጥር) እንደ ተሰባበረ ርግጋፊ ኾኑ፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:34: እኛ በእነርሱ ላይ ጠጠርን ያዘለች ነፋስን ላክን፡፡ የሉጥ ቤተሰቦች ብቻ ሲቀሩ (እነርሱንስ) በሌሊት መጨረሻ ላይ አዳንናቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:35: ከእኛ በኾነ ጸጋ (አዳንናቸው)፡፡ እንደዚሁ ያመሰገነን ሰው እንመነዳለን፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:36: ብርቱይቱን አያያዛችንንም በእርግጥ አስጠነቀቃቸው፡፡ በማስጠንቀቂያዎቹም ተከራከሩ፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:37: ከእንግዶቹም እንዲያስመቻቸው ደጋግመው ፈለጉት፡፡ ወዲያውም ዓይኖቻቸውን አበስን፡፡ «ቅጣቴንና ማስጠንቀቂያዎቼንም ቅመሱ» (አልናቸው)፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:38: በማለዳም ዘውታሪ የኾነ ቅጣት በእርግጥ ማለደባቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:40: ቁርኣንንም ለመገንዘብ በእርግጥ አገራነው፡፡ ተገሳጭም አልለን?
Amharic.verse 54:42: በተዓምራቶቻችን በሁሏም አስተባበሉ፡፡ የብርቱ ቻይንም አያያዝ ያዝናቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:43: ከሓዲዎቻችሁ ከእነዚህ በላጮች ናቸውን? ወይስ ለናንተ በመጽሐፎች ውስጥ (የተነገረ) ነፃነት አላችሁን?
Amharic.verse 54:45: ክምቹዎቹ በእርግጥ ድል ይምመታሉ፡፡ ጀርባዎችንም ያዞራሉ፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:46: ይልቁንም ሰዓቲቱ (ትንሣኤ) ቀጠሮዋቸው ናት፡፡ ሰዓቲቱም በጣም የከበደችና የመረረች ናት፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:48: በእሳት ውስጥ በፊቶቻቸው በሚጎተቱበት ቀን «የሰቀርን መንካት ቅመሱ» (ይባላሉ)፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:50: ትእዛዛችንም እንደ ዓይን ቅጽበት አንዲት (ቃል) እንጅ ሌላ አይደለም፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:52: የሠሩትም ነገር ሁሉ በመጽሐፎች ውስጥ ነው፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:54: አላህን ፈሪዎቹ በአትክልቶችና በወንዞች ውስጥ ናቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 54:55: (እነርሱም ውድቅ ቃልና መውወንጀል በሌለበት) በእውነት መቀመጫ ውስጥ ቻይ የሆነው ንጉሥ ዘንድ ናቸው፡፡

Arabic.verse 54:24: (ٍرُعُسَو ٍلاَلَض يِفَّل اًذِإ اَّنِإ ُهُعِبَّتَّن اًدِحاَو اَّنِّم اًرَشَبَأ اوُلاَقَف

Azerbaijani.verse 54:1: O Saat yaxınlaşdı və ay bölündü.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:2: Onlar bir möcüzə gördükdə üz döndərib: “Bu, tez keçib-gedən bir sehrdir” deyirlər.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:3: Onlar Peyğəmbəri yalançı saydılar və öz nəfslərinin istəklərinə tabe oldular. Halbuki hər bir iş bərqərar olacaqdır.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:4: Onlara küfrdən çəkindirən neçə-neçə xəbərlər gəlmişdir.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:5: Bu böyük bir hikmətdir. Lakin arxa çevirənlərə təhdidlər nə fayda verə bilər?!
Azerbaijani.verse 54:6: Sən də onları tərk et! Carçının onları xoşagəlməz bir şeyə çağıracağı gün
Azerbaijani.verse 54:7: onlar zəlil baxışlarla gözlərini aşağı dikmiş halda ətrafa yayılan çəyirtkələr kimi qəbirlərindən çıxacaqlar.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:8: Kafirlər carçıya tərəf tələsərək: “Bu nə çətin bir gündür!”– deyəcəklər.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:9: Onlardan əvvəl Nuh qövmü elçiləri yalançı hesab etmişdi. Onlar qulumuzu yalançı sayıb: “O, dəlidir!”– dedilər və ona hədə-qorxu gəldilər.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:10: O, Rəbbinə yalvarıb: “Məni üstələdilər! Mənə kömək et!”– dedi.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:11: Biz göyün qapılarını leysan yağışı ilə açdıq.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:12: Yeri yarıb bulaqlar qaynatdıq. Göydən tökülən və yerdən çıxan sular əzəldən yazılmış bir iş üçün bir-birinə qovuşdu.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:13: Biz onu taxtalardan pərçimlənib mismarlanmış gəmidə daşıdıq.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:14: İnkar edilmiş peyğəmbərə mükafat olaraq o gəmi Gözlərimiz önündə üzüb gedirdi.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:15: Biz onu (həmin hadisəni) nəsillərə ibrət üçün saxladıq. Amma heç bir yada salan varmı?
Azerbaijani.verse 54:16: Görəydin Mənim əzabım və qorxutmağım necə oldu!
Azerbaijani.verse 54:17: Biz Quranı yada salmaq üçün asanlaşdırdıq. Amma heç bir yada salan varmı?
Azerbaijani.verse 54:18: Ad qövmü də elçiləri yalançı saydı. Görəydin Mənim əzabım və qorxutmağım necə oldu!
Azerbaijani.verse 54:19: Biz uzun sürən uğursuz bir gündə onların üstünə çox soyuq külək göndərdik.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:20: O, insanları kökündən çıxardılmış xurma kötükləri kimi qopardıb atırdı.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:21: Görəydin Mənim əzabım və qorxutmağım necə oldu!
Azerbaijani.verse 54:22: Biz Quranı yada salmaq üçün asanlaşdırdıq. Amma heç bir yada salan varmı?
Azerbaijani.verse 54:23: Səmud qövmü də xəbərdarlıqları yalan saydı.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:24: Onlar dedilər: “Özümüzdən olan bir adamamı tabe olacağıq? Onda biz azğınlığa düşər və ağılsız iş görmüş olarıq!
Azerbaijani.verse 54:25: Zikr aramızdan təkcə onamı verildi? Xeyr, o, yalançıdır, lovğadır!”
Azerbaijani.verse 54:26: Sabah onlar kimin yalançı və lovğa olduğunu mütləq biləcəklər.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:27: Biz onları sınağa çəkmək üçün bir dişi dəvə göndərəcəyik. Sən isə gözlə və səbir et!
Azerbaijani.verse 54:28: Onlara xəbər ver ki, bu su, dəvə ilə onlar arasında bölüşdürülmüşdür. Hər biri su içməyə öz növbəsində gəlsin!”
Azerbaijani.verse 54:29: Onlar öz yoldaşlarını çağırdılar. O da dəvəni tutub diz vətərini kəsdi.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:30: Görəydin Mənim əzabım və qorxutmağım necə oldu!
Azerbaijani.verse 54:31: Həqiqətən, Biz onlara bircə tükürpədici səs göndərdik və onlar mal-qara ağılında istifadə edilən quru saman kimi oldular.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:32: Biz Quranı yada salmaq üçün asanlaşdırdıq. Amma heç bir yada salan varmı?
Azerbaijani.verse 54:33: Lut qövmü də xəbərdarlıqları yalan saydı.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:34: Biz onların üstünə qasırğa ilə birgə daşlar göndərdik. Yalnız Lutun ailəsini sübh çağı xilas etdik –
Azerbaijani.verse 54:35: Özümüzdən bir mərhəmət olaraq! Biz şükür edənləri belə mükafatlandırırıq.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:36: Lut onları Bizim əzabımızla hədələdi, onlar isə bu xəbərdarlıqlara şübhə ilə yanaşdılar.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:37: Onlar Lutdan qonaqlarını israrla tələb etdilər. Biz də onları kor etdik və dedik: “Əzabımı və təhdidlərimi dadın!”
Azerbaijani.verse 54:38: Sübh tezdən onlara yaxalarından əl çəkməyəcək bir əzab gəldi.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:39: Elə isə əzabımı və təhdidlərimi dadın!
Azerbaijani.verse 54:40: Biz Quranı yada salmaq üçün asanlaşdırdıq. Amma heç bir yada salan varmı?
Azerbaijani.verse 54:42: Onlar dəlillərimizin hamısını yalan saydılar. Biz də onları Qüvvət və Qüdrətimizə layiq şəkildə əzabla yaxaladıq.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:43: Sizin kafirləriniz onlardan yaxşıdırmı? Yoxsa Kitablarda sizə toxunulmazlıq vəd edilmişdir?
Azerbaijani.verse 54:44: Yoxsa onlar: “Biz qalib gələcək bir dəstəyik!”– deyirlər?
Azerbaijani.verse 54:45: Bu dəstə mütləq məğlub olacaq və arxaya dönüb qaçacaqdır.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:46: Xeyr! Onlara vəd edilmiş vaxt o Saatdır. O Saat isə daha ağır, daha acıdır.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:47: Şübhəsiz ki, günahkarlar azğınlıq və əzab-əziyyət içindədirlər.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:48: O gün onlar üzüstə Cəhənnəmə sürüklənəcək və onlara: “Cəhənnəmin təmasını dadın!”– deyiləcəkdir.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:49: Biz, həqiqətən də, hər şeyi qədərincə yaratdıq.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:50: Biz bircə dəfə əmr edirik, o da bir göz qırpımında yerinə yetir.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:51: Biz neçə-neçə həmtaylarınızı məhv etmişik. Amma heç yada salan varmı?
Azerbaijani.verse 54:52: Onların etdiyi hər şey əməllərinin yazıldığı kitablarındadır.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:53: Hər bir kiçik və böyük əməl yazılmışdır.
Azerbaijani.verse 54:54: Şübhəsiz ki, müttəqilər Cənnət bağlarında və çaylar kənarında,
Azerbaijani.verse 54:55: qadir Hökmdarın hüzurundakı haqq məclisində olacaqlar!

Bengali.verse 54:2: তারা যদি কোন নিদর্শন দেখে তবে মুখ ফিরিয়ে নেয় এবং বলে, এটা তো চিরাগত জাদু।
Bengali.verse 54:3: তারা মিথ্যারোপ করছে এবং নিজেদের খেয়াল-খুশীর অনুসরণ করছে। প্রত্যেক কাজ যথাসময়ে স্থিরীকৃত হয়।
Bengali.verse 54:4: তাদের কাছে এমন সংবাদ এসে গেছে, যাতে সাবধানবাণী রয়েছে।
Bengali.verse 54:5: এটা পরিপূর্ণ জ্ঞান, তবে সতর্ককারীগণ তাদের কোন উপকারে আসে না।
Bengali.verse 54:6: অতএব, আপনি তাদের থেকে মুখ ফিরিয়ে নিন। যেদিন আহবানকারী আহবান করবে এক অপ্রিয় পরিণামের দিকে,
Bengali.verse 54:7: তারা তখন অবনমিত নেত্রে কবর থেকে বের হবে বিক্ষিপ্ত পংগপাল সদৃশ।
Bengali.verse 54:8: তারা আহবানকারীর দিকে দৌড়াতে থাকবে। কাফেরা বলবেঃ এটা কঠিন দিন।
Bengali.verse 54:9: তাদের পূর্বে নূহের সম্প্রদায়ও মিথ্যারোপ করেছিল। তারা মিথ্যারোপ করেছিল আমার বান্দা নূহের প্রতি এবং বলেছিলঃ এ তো উম্মাদ। তাঁরা তাকে হুমকি প্রদর্শন করেছিল।
Bengali.verse 54:10: অতঃপর সে তার পালনকর্তাকে ডেকে বললঃ আমি অক্ষম, অতএব, তুমি প্রতিবিধান কর।
Bengali.verse 54:11: তখন আমি খুলে দিলাম আকাশের দ্বার প্রবল বারিবর্ষণের মাধ্যমে।
Bengali.verse 54:12: এবং ভুমি থেকে প্রবাহিত করলাম প্রস্রবণ। অতঃপর সব পানি মিলিত হল এক পরিকম্পিত কাজে।
Bengali.verse 54:13: আমি নূহকে আরোহণ করালাম এক কাষ্ঠ ও পেরেক নির্মিত জলযানে।
Bengali.verse 54:14: যা চলত আমার দৃষ্টি সামনে। এটা তার পক্ষ থেকে প্রতিশোধ ছিল, যাকে প্রত্যখ্যান করা হয়েছিল।
Bengali.verse 54:15: আমি একে এক নিদর্শনরূপে রেখে দিয়েছি। অতএব, কোন চিন্তাশীল আছে কি?
Bengali.verse 54:16: কেমন কঠোর ছিল আমার শাস্তি ও সতর্কবাণী।
Bengali.verse 54:17: আমি কোরআনকে সহজ করে দিয়েছি বোঝার জন্যে। অতএব, কোন চিন্তাশীল আছে কি?
Bengali.verse 54:18: আদ সম্প্রদায় মিথ্যারোপ করেছিল, অতঃপর কেমন কঠোর হয়েছিল আমার শাস্তি ও সতর্কবাণী।
Bengali.verse 54:19: আমি তাদের উপর প্রেরণ করেছিলাম ঝঞ্জাবায়ু এক চিরাচরিত অশুভ দিনে।
Bengali.verse 54:20: তা মানুষকে উৎখাত করছিল, যেন তারা উৎপাটিত খর্জুর বৃক্ষের কান্ড।
Bengali.verse 54:21: অতঃপর কেমন কঠোর ছিল আমার শাস্তি ও সতর্কবাণী।
Bengali.verse 54:22: আমি কোরআনকে বোঝার জন্যে সহজ করে দিয়েছি। অতএব, কোন চিন্তাশীল আছে কি?
Bengali.verse 54:23: সামুদ সম্প্রদায় সতর্ককারীদের প্রতি মিথ্যারোপ করেছিল।
Bengali.verse 54:24: তারা বলেছিলঃ আমরা কি আমাদেরই একজনের অনুসরণ করব? তবে তো আমরা বিপথগামী ও বিকার গ্রস্থরূপে গণ্য হব।
Bengali.verse 54:25: আমাদের মধ্যে কি তারই প্রতি উপদেশ নাযিল করা হয়েছে? বরং সে একজন মিথ্যাবাদী, দাম্ভিক।
Bengali.verse 54:26: এখন আগামীকল্যই তারা জানতে পারবে কে মিথ্যাবাদী, দাম্ভিক।
Bengali.verse 54:27: আমি তাদের পরীক্ষার জন্য এক উষ্ট্রী প্রেরণ করব, অতএব, তাদের প্রতি লক্ষ্য রাখ এবং সবর কর।
Bengali.verse 54:28: এবং তাদেরকে জানিয়ে দাও যে, তাদের মধ্যে পানির পালা নির্ধারিত হয়েছে এবং পালাক্রমে উপস্থিত হতে হবে।
Bengali.verse 54:29: অতঃপর তারা তাদের সঙ্গীকে ডাকল। সে তাকে ধরল এবং বধ করল।
Bengali.verse 54:30: অতঃপর কেমন কঠোর ছিল আমার শাস্তি ও সতর্কবাণী।
Bengali.verse 54:31: আমি তাদের প্রতি একটিমাত্র নিনাদ প্রেরণ করেছিলাম। এতেই তারা হয়ে গেল শুষ্ক শাখাপল্লব নির্মিত দলিত খোয়াড়ের ন্যায়।
Bengali.verse 54:32: আমি কোরআনকে বোঝার জন্যে সহজ করে দিয়েছি। অতএব, কোন চিন্তাশীল আছে কি?
Bengali.verse 54:34: আমি তাদের প্রতি প্রেরণ করেছিলাম প্রস্তর বর্ষণকারী প্রচন্ড ঘূর্ণিবায়ু; কিন্তু লূত পরিবারের উপর নয়। আমি তাদেরকে রাতের শেষপ্রহরে উদ্ধার করেছিলাম।
Bengali.verse 54:35: আমার পক্ষ থেকে অনুগ্রহ স্বরূপ। যারা কৃতজ্ঞতা স্বীকার করে, আমি তাদেরকে এভাবে পুরস্কৃত করে থকি।
Bengali.verse 54:36: লূত (আঃ) তাদেরকে আমার প্রচন্ড পাকড়াও সম্পর্কে সতর্ক করেছিল। অতঃপর তারা সতর্কবাণী সম্পর্কে বাকবিতন্ডা করেছিল।
Bengali.verse 54:37: তারা লূতের (আঃ) কাছে তার মেহমানদেরকে দাবী করেছিল। তখন আমি তাদের চক্ষু লোপ করে দিলাম। অতএব, আস্বাদন কর আমার শাস্তি ও সতর্কবাণী।
Bengali.verse 54:38: তাদেরকে প্রত্যুষে নির্ধারিত শাস্তি আঘাত হেনেছিল।
Bengali.verse 54:39: অতএব, আমার শাস্তি ও সতর্কবাণী আস্বাদন কর।
Bengali.verse 54:40: আমি কোরআনকে বোঝবার জন্যে সহজ করে দিয়েছি। অতএব, কোন চিন্তাশীল আছে কি?
Bengali.verse 54:41: ফেরাউন সম্প্রদায়ের কাছেও সতর্ককারীগণ আগমন করেছিল।
Bengali.verse 54:42: তারা আমার সকল নিদর্শনের প্রতি মিথ্যারোপ করেছিল। অতঃপর আমি পরাভূতকারী, পরাক্রমশালীর ন্যায় তাদেরকে পাকড়াও করলাম।
Bengali.verse 54:43: তোমাদের মধ্যকার কাফেররা কি তাদের চাইতে শ্রেষ্ঠ ? না তোমাদের মুক্তির সনদপত্র রয়েছে কিতাবসমূহে?
Bengali.verse 54:44: না তারা বলে যে, আমারা এক অপরাজেয় দল?
Bengali.verse 54:45: এ দল তো সত্ত্বরই পরাজিত হবে এবং পৃষ্ঠপ্রদর্শন করবে।
Bengali.verse 54:46: বরং কেয়ামত তাদের প্রতিশ্রুত সময় এবং কেয়ামত ঘোরতর বিপদ ও তিক্ততর।
Bengali.verse 54:48: যেদিন তাদেরকে মুখ হিঁচড়ে টেনে নেয়া হবে জাহান্নামে, বলা হবেঃ অগ্নির খাদ্য আস্বাদন কর।
Bengali.verse 54:49: আমি প্রত্যেক বস্তুকে পরিমিতরূপে সৃষ্টি করেছি।
Bengali.verse 54:50: আমার কাজ তো এক মুহূর্তে চোখের পলকের মত।
Bengali.verse 54:51: আমি তোমাদের সমমনা লোকদেরকে ধ্বংস করেছি, অতএব, কোন চিন্তাশীল আছে কি?
Bengali.verse 54:52: তারা যা কিছু করেছে, সবই আমলনামায় লিপিবদ্ধ আছে।

Bosnian.verse 54:1: Bliži se Čas i Mjesec se raspolutio! –
Bosnian.verse 54:2: a oni, uvijek kada vide čudo, okreću glave i govore: "Čarolija neprestana!"
Bosnian.verse 54:3: Oni ne vjeruju i povode se za prohtjevima svojim, a sve je već određeno.
Bosnian.verse 54:4: I dolaze im vijesti koje ih trebaju odvratiti –
Bosnian.verse 54:5: mudrost savršena, ali opomene ne koriste,
Bosnian.verse 54:6: zato se okreni od njih! Na Dan kad ih glasnik pozove na nešto užasno
Bosnian.verse 54:7: oni će oborenih pogleda iz grobova izlaziti, kao skakavci rasuti,
Bosnian.verse 54:8: i, netremice gledajući u glasnika i žureći, nevjernici će govoriti: "Ovo je težak dan!"
Bosnian.verse 54:9: Prije njih Nuhov narod nije vjerovao i roba Našeg je u laž utjerivao, govoreći: "Luđak!" – i Nuh je onemogućen bio.
Bosnian.verse 54:10: I on je Gospodara svoga zamolio: "Ja sam pobijeđen, Ti se osveti!"
Bosnian.verse 54:11: I Mi smo kapije nebeske pootvarali vodi koja je neprestano lila,
Bosnian.verse 54:12: i učinili da iz zemlje izvori provru, i vode su se sastajale kako je određeno bilo,
Bosnian.verse 54:13: a njega smo nosili na onoj od dasaka i klinaca sagrađenoj
Bosnian.verse 54:14: koja je plovila pod brigom Našom – nagrada je to bila za onoga koji je odbačen bio.
Bosnian.verse 54:15: I Mi to ostavismo kao pouku – pa ima li ikoga ko bi pouku primio?
Bosnian.verse 54:16: I kakve su bile kazna Moja i opomene Moje!
Bosnian.verse 54:17: A Mi smo Kur'an učinili dostupnim za pouku – pa ima li ikoga ko bi pouku primio?
Bosnian.verse 54:18: I Ad nije vjerovao – pa kakve su bile kazna Moja i opomene Moje!
Bosnian.verse 54:19: Jednog kobnog dana poslali smo na njih leden vjetar koji je neprestano puhao
Bosnian.verse 54:20: i ljude dizao, kao da su palmina stabla iščupana,
Bosnian.verse 54:21: i kakve su bile kazna Moja i opomene Moje!
Bosnian.verse 54:22: A Mi smo Kur'an učinili dostupnim za učenje napamet i pouku, pa ima li ikoga ko bi pouku primio?
Bosnian.verse 54:23: I Semud u opomene nije vjerovao.
Bosnian.verse 54:24: "Zar da slijedimo jednog od nas!" – govorili su. "Tada bismo, uistinu, bili u zabludi i bili bismo ludi.
Bosnian.verse 54:25: Zar baš njemu, između nas, da bude poslana Objava?! Ne, on je lažljivac oholi!"
Bosnian.verse 54:26: "Vrlo brzo će oni saznati ko je lažljivac oholi!
Bosnian.verse 54:27: Mi ćemo poslati kamilu da bismo ih iskušali, pa pričekaj ih i budi strpljiv.
Bosnian.verse 54:28: I upozori ih da će se voda između njih i nje dijeliti, svakom obroku pristupiće onaj čiji je red!"
Bosnian.verse 54:29: Ali oni pozvaše jednog od svojih, pa se on spremi i prekla je –
Bosnian.verse 54:30: i kakve su bile kazna Moja i opomene Moje:
Bosnian.verse 54:31: Mi poslasmo na njih jedan jedini krik, i oni postadoše poput zdrobljenog suhog lišća koje sakuplja onaj koji ima tor.
Bosnian.verse 54:32: A Mi smo Kur'an učinili dostupnim za pouku, pa ima li ikoga ko bi pouku primio?
Bosnian.verse 54:33: I Lutov narod u opomene nije vjerovao.
Bosnian.verse 54:34: Na njih vjetar, pun pijeska, poslasmo – samo ne na Lutovu porodicu, nju u svitanje spasismo,
Bosnian.verse 54:35: iz milosti Naše. Eto, tako Mi nagrađujemo one koji zahvaljuju.
Bosnian.verse 54:36: A on im je bio prijetio silom Našom, ali su oni u prijetnje sumnjali.
Bosnian.verse 54:37: Oni su od njega goste njegove tražili, pa smo ih im oslijepili: "Iskusite kaznu Moju i prijetnje Moje!"
Bosnian.verse 54:38: A rano izjutra stiže ih kazna koju će neprestano osjećati.
Bosnian.verse 54:40: A Mi smo Kur'an učinili dostupnim za učenje napamet i pouku, pa ima li ikoga ko bi pouku primio?!
Bosnian.verse 54:41: I faraonovim ljudima su opomene došle,
Bosnian.verse 54:42: ali oni porekoše sva značenja Naša, pa ih Mi kaznismo onako kako kažnjava Silni i Moćni.
Bosnian.verse 54:43: Da li su nevjernici vaši imalo jači od njih, ili vi u knjigama nebeskim imate kakvu povelju?
Bosnian.verse 54:44: Zar ovi da govore: "Mi smo skup nepobjedivi!"
Bosnian.verse 54:45: Skup će, sigurno, poražen biti, a oni će se u bijeg dati!
Bosnian.verse 54:46: Međutim, Smak svijeta im je rok, a Smak svijeta je užasniji i gorči.
Bosnian.verse 54:47: Grješnici će, sigurno, stradati i u ognju biti
Bosnian.verse 54:48: na Dan kada budu u vatru odvučeni, s licima dolje okrenutim: "Iskusite vatru džehennemsku!"
Bosnian.verse 54:50: i naređenje Naše je samo jedna riječ – sve bude u tren oka.
Bosnian.verse 54:51: A Mi smo već slične vama uništili, pa ima li ikoga ko bi pouku primio?!
Bosnian.verse 54:52: I sve što su uradili u listovima je,
Bosnian.verse 54:53: i sve, i malo i veliko, u retke je stavljeno.
Bosnian.verse 54:54: Oni koji su se Allaha bojali biće u džennetskim baščama i pored rijeka
Bosnian.verse 54:55: na mjestu u kome će biti zadovoljni, kod Vladara Svemoćnoga.

Bulgarian.verse 54:1: Наближи Часът и се разцепи луната.
Bulgarian.verse 54:2: Но и да видят знамение, те се отдръпват и казват: “Продължителна магия.”
Bulgarian.verse 54:3: И го взимат за лъжа, и следват своите страсти. Но за всяко дело има край.
Bulgarian.verse 54:4: Дойдоха вече при тях вести, които да ги възпират,
Bulgarian.verse 54:5: зряла мъдрост [- Коранът] - ала безполезни са за тях предупредителите.
Bulgarian.verse 54:6: Затова се отвърни от тях [о, Мухаммад]! В Деня, когато зовящият призове към нещо ужасно,
Bulgarian.verse 54:7: те със сведен поглед ще излязат от гробовете като пръснати скакалци,
Bulgarian.verse 54:8: забързани към зовящия. Ще кажат неверниците: “Това е тежък Ден.”
Bulgarian.verse 54:9: Отричаше преди тях и народът на Нух. Отричаха Нашия раб и казваха: “Той е луд!”, и бе прогонен с крясъци.
Bulgarian.verse 54:10: Тогава призова той своя Господ: “Аз съм победен, помогни ми!”
Bulgarian.verse 54:11: И разтворихме Ние вратите на небето със струяща вода,
Bulgarian.verse 54:12: и сторихме да бликнат извори от земята, и водите се срещнаха за предопределена повеля.
Bulgarian.verse 54:13: А него понесохме върху [Ковчега от] дъски и гвоздеи,
Bulgarian.verse 54:14: плаващ пред Очите Ни - въздаяние за онзи, който бе отричан.
Bulgarian.verse 54:15: И оставихме това за знамение, но има ли кой да се поучи?
Bulgarian.verse 54:16: И какво бе Моето мъчение и Моето предупреждение!
Bulgarian.verse 54:17: И сторихме Корана лесен за поучение, но има ли кой да се поучи?
Bulgarian.verse 54:18: И адитите отричаха. И какво бе Моето мъчение и Моето предупреждение!
Bulgarian.verse 54:19: Изпратихме срещу тях вихър в ден на непрестанно злочестие,
Bulgarian.verse 54:20: изтръгващ хората, сякаш са стволове на изскубнати палми.
Bulgarian.verse 54:21: И какво бе Моето мъчение и Моето предупреждение!
Bulgarian.verse 54:22: И сторихме Корана лесен за поучение, но има ли кой да се поучи?
Bulgarian.verse 54:24: И рекоха: “Нима човек от нас ще последваме? Тогава ние ще изпаднем в заблуда и безумие.
Bulgarian.verse 54:25: Нима на него бе разкрито Поучението сред нас? Не, той е надменен лъжец.”
Bulgarian.verse 54:26: Утре ще научат кой е надменен лъжец.
Bulgarian.verse 54:27: Изпращаме Ние камилата като изпитание за тях. Наблюдавай ги и търпи!
Bulgarian.verse 54:28: И ги извести, че водата е поделена между [нея и] тях! И пиенето на всеки е разпределено.
Bulgarian.verse 54:29: Но извикаха техен другар и той се зае, и я закла.
Bulgarian.verse 54:30: И какво бе Моето мъчение и Моето предупреждение!
Bulgarian.verse 54:31: Изпратихме срещу тях само един Вик и станаха като сухите сламки на сеното.
Bulgarian.verse 54:32: И сторихме Корана лесен за поучение, но има ли кой да се поучи?
Bulgarian.verse 54:33: И народът на Лут отричаше предупредителите.
Bulgarian.verse 54:34: Изпратихме срещу тях ураган от камъни, освен за семейството на Лут. Спасихме ги на развиделяване -
Bulgarian.verse 54:35: благодеяние от Нас. Така въздаваме на онзи, който е признателен.
Bulgarian.verse 54:36: Той ги предупреди за Нашето мъчение, но те се усъмниха в предупреждението.
Bulgarian.verse 54:37: И поискаха от него да ги допусне до гостите си, но ослепихме очите им. Вкусете Моето мъчение и Моето предупреждение!
Bulgarian.verse 54:38: И рано сутринта ги сполетя трайно мъчение.
Bulgarian.verse 54:39: Вкусете Моето мъчение и Моето предупреждение!
Bulgarian.verse 54:40: И сторихме Корана лесен за поучение, но има ли кой да се поучи?
Bulgarian.verse 54:41: Предупредителите дойдоха и при хората на Фараона,
Bulgarian.verse 54:42: [но] те взеха за лъжа всичките Ни знамения. Затова ги сграбчихме, както подобава на всесилен, всемогъщ.
Bulgarian.verse 54:43: Нима вашите неверници са по-добри от онези, или за вас има оневиняване в Писанията?
Bulgarian.verse 54:44: Или казват: “Не сме ли ние непобедимо множество?”
Bulgarian.verse 54:45: Ще бъде разгромено множеството и ще обърне то гръб в бяг.
Bulgarian.verse 54:46: Часът е обещаният им срок. Часът е най-злочестият и най-горчивият.
Bulgarian.verse 54:47: Престъпниците ще са в заблуда и безумие
Bulgarian.verse 54:48: в Деня, когато бъдат влачени по лице в Огъня: “Вкусете допира на Ада!”
Bulgarian.verse 54:49: Ние всяко нещо сътворихме с мяра.
Bulgarian.verse 54:50: Нашата повеля се изпълнява, докато мигне окото.
Bulgarian.verse 54:51: Вече погубихме подобните на вас. Но има ли кой да се поучи?
Bulgarian.verse 54:52: И всяко нещо, което са вършили, го има в писанията.
Bulgarian.verse 54:53: Всичко, малко или голямо, е записано.
Bulgarian.verse 54:54: Богобоязливите ще пребъдат сред градини и реки -

Chinese.verse 54:1: 复活时临近了，月亮破裂了。
Chinese.verse 54:2: 如果他们看见一种迹象，他们就退避，而且说：这是一种有力的魔术。
Chinese.verse 54:3: 他们否认他，而且顺从私欲。每一件事都是确定的。
Chinese.verse 54:4: 包含警戒的许多消息，确已来临他们了，
Chinese.verse 54:5: 那是极精密的智慧；但警告是无效的，
Chinese.verse 54:6: 故你应当避开他们。当召唤者召人于难事的日子，
Chinese.verse 54:7: 他们不敢仰视地由坟中出来，好象是遍地的蝗虫；
Chinese.verse 54:8: 大家引颈而奔，群集于召唤者的面前。不信道的人们将说：这是一个烦难的日子！
Chinese.verse 54:9: 在他们之前，努哈的宗族否认过，他们否认过我的仆人，他们说：这是一个疯人。他曾被喝斥，
Chinese.verse 54:10: 故他祈祷他的主说：我确是被压迫的，求你相助吧！
Chinese.verse 54:11: 我就以倾注的雨水开了许多天门，
Chinese.verse 54:12: 我又使大地上的泉源涌出；雨水和泉水，就依既定的情状而汇合。
Chinese.verse 54:13: 我使他乘坐一只用木板和钉子制造的船上，
Chinese.verse 54:14: 在我的眷顾之下飘流，以报答被人否认者。
Chinese.verse 54:15: 我确已将这件事留作一种迹象，有接受劝告者吗？
Chinese.verse 54:16: 我的刑罚和警告是怎样的！
Chinese.verse 54:17: 我确已使《古兰经》易于记诵，有接受劝告的人吗？
Chinese.verse 54:18: 阿德人否认过先知，我的刑罚和警告是怎样的！
Chinese.verse 54:19: 我确已使暴风在一个很凶恶的日子去毁灭他们，
Chinese.verse 54:20: 暴风将众人拔起，他们好象被拔出的海枣树干一样。
Chinese.verse 54:21: 我的刑罚和警告是怎样的！
Chinese.verse 54:22: 我确已使《古兰经》易于记诵，有接受劝告的人吗？
Chinese.verse 54:24: 故他们说：我们同族的一个凡人，我们能顺从他吗？如果那样，我们必定陷于迷误和疯狂之中。
Chinese.verse 54:25: 难道他在我们之间独自奉到启示吗？不然，他是说谎者，是傲慢者。
Chinese.verse 54:26: 他们明日将知道谁是说谎者，谁是傲慢者。
Chinese.verse 54:27: 我必定使母驼考验他们，故你应当期待他们，并应当坚忍，
Chinese.verse 54:28: 你应当告诉他们，井水是他们和母驼所均分的，应得水分的，轮流着到井边来。
Chinese.verse 54:29: 他们曾喊来他们的朋友，他就拿起剑来宰了母驼。
Chinese.verse 54:30: 我的刑罚和警告是怎样的！
Chinese.verse 54:31: 我确已使一种爆炸去毁灭他们，他们就变成造圈栏者所用的枯木。
Chinese.verse 54:32: 我确已使《古兰经》易于记诵，有接受劝告的人吗？
Chinese.verse 54:33: 鲁特的宗族曾否认警告，
Chinese.verse 54:34: 我确已使飞沙走石的暴风去毁灭他们；惟鲁特的信徒，我在黎明时拯救了他们。
Chinese.verse 54:35: 那是从我的主那里发出的恩典，我如此报酬感谢者。
Chinese.verse 54:36: 他确已将我的惩治警告他们，但他们以怀疑的态度否认警告。
Chinese.verse 54:37: 他们确已诱惑他，叫他不要保护他的客人，但我涂抹了他们的眼睛。你们尝试我的刑罚和警告吧！
Chinese.verse 54:38: 一种永恒的刑罚在早晨确已袭击了他们。
Chinese.verse 54:39: 你们尝试我的刑罚和警告吧！
Chinese.verse 54:40: 我确已《古兰经》易于记诵，有接受劝告的人吗？
Chinese.verse 54:41: 警告确已降临法老的百姓，
Chinese.verse 54:42: 他们否认了我的一切迹象，故我以万能者全能者的态度，惩治了他们。
Chinese.verse 54:43: 你们中不信道的人们比这等人还优秀呢！还是天经中有关于你们的赦条呢？
Chinese.verse 54:44: 难道他们说：我们是一个常胜的团体。
Chinese.verse 54:45: 那个团体将败北，他们将转背。
Chinese.verse 54:46: 不然，复活时是他们的约期；复活时是更艰难的，是更辛苦的。
Chinese.verse 54:47: 犯罪者的确在迷误和烈火中。
Chinese.verse 54:48: 他们匍匐着被拖入火狱之日，将对他们说：你们尝试火狱的烧灼吧！
Chinese.verse 54:49: 我确已依定量而创造万物，
Chinese.verse 54:50: 我的命令只是快如转瞬的一句话。
Chinese.verse 54:51: 我确已将你们的宗派毁灭了。有接受劝告的人吗？
Chinese.verse 54:52: 凡他们所做的事，都记载在天经中。
Chinese.verse 54:53: 一切小事和大事，都是被记录的。
Chinese.verse 54:54: 敬畏的人们，必定在乐园里，在光明中，
Chinese.verse 54:55: 在全能的主那里，得居一个如意的地位。

Danish.verse 54:1: Het Uur is nabij, en de Maan is opengespleten
Danish.verse 54:2: Maar als zij (de ongelovigen) een teken zien wenden zij zich er van af en zeggen: Een voortdurende toverkunst
Danish.verse 54:3: Zij verloochenen en volgen hun eigen begeerten. Maar elke verordening (Gods) zal plaats hebben
Danish.verse 54:4: En er zijn reeds tijdingen tot hen gekomen waarin een waarschuwing ligt
Danish.verse 54:5: Volmaakte wijsheid; maar de waarschuwingen helpen hen niet
Danish.verse 54:6: Wend u daarom van hen af. De Dag waarop de aankondiger hen zal roepen tot iets onaangenaams
Danish.verse 54:7: Dan zullen zij met nedergeslagen ogen uit hun graven komen als verstrooide sprinkhanen
Danish.verse 54:8: Zich naar de omroeper haastend. De ongelovigen zullen zeggen Dit is een moeilijke dag
Danish.verse 54:9: Vóór hen verloochende het volk van Noach, zij verloochenden Onze dienaar en zeiden: Een waanzinnige. En hij werd verdreven
Danish.verse 54:10: Daarom bad hij tot zijn Heer: Ik ben gewis verslagen, sta mij bij
Danish.verse 54:11: Toen openden Wij de poorten van de hemel voor het stromende water
Danish.verse 54:12: En Wij spleten de aarde door bronnen, waar door de wateren elkander ontmoetten volgens een vastgesteld plan
Danish.verse 54:13: En Wij droegen hem op iets, bestaande uit planken en spijkers
Danish.verse 54:14: Het dreef onder Onze ogen voort als een beloning voor hem, die verworpen was
Danish.verse 54:15: En Wij maakten dit tot een teken. Is er iemand die er lering uit trekt
Danish.verse 54:16: Hoe vreselijk was Mijn straf en Mijn waarschuwing
Danish.verse 54:17: En Wij hebben inderdaad de Koran gemakkelijk gemaakt ter vermaning. Is er iemand die er lering uit trekt
Danish.verse 54:18: Aad verloochende eveneens. Hoe (ernstig) was Mijn straf en Mijn waarschuwing
Danish.verse 54:19: Wij zonden een woedende wind tegen hen, op een kwade, onvergetelijke dag
Danish.verse 54:20: Die mensen wegtrok als waren zij de stammen van ontwortelde palmbomen
Danish.verse 54:21: Hoe groot was toen Mijn straf en Mijn waarschuwing
Danish.verse 54:22: En Wij hebben inderdaad de Koran gemakkelijk gemaakt ter vermaning. Is er iemand die er lering uit trekt
Danish.verse 54:23: Ook (het volk van) Samoed verloochende de waarschuwers
Danish.verse 54:24: En zij zeiden: Moeten wij een man uit ons midden volgen? Dan zouden wij inderdaad verdwaald en krankzinnig zijn
Danish.verse 54:25: Is de vermaning hem alleen gegeven? Neen, hij is een grote leugenaar en misdadiger
Danish.verse 54:26: Morgen zullen zij weten wie de grote leugenaar en misdadiger is
Danish.verse 54:27: Wij zullen de kameel zenden om hen op de proef te stellen. Let daarom op hen en heb geduld
Danish.verse 54:28: En zeg hun, dat het water tussen hen is verdeeld en dat de tijd van elke drinkbeurt in acht moet worden genomen
Danish.verse 54:29: Maar zij riepen hun metgezel, deze nam het (kameel) en verlamde het
Danish.verse 54:30: Hoe vreselijk was toen Mijn straf en Mijn waarschuwing
Danish.verse 54:31: Wij zonden een enkele straf tegen hen en zij werden als droog, vertrapt stro
Danish.verse 54:32: En Wij hebben inderdaad de Koran gemakkelijk gemaakt ter vermaning. Is er iemand die er lering uit trekt
Danish.verse 54:33: Het volk van Lot verloochende de waarschuwers ook
Danish.verse 54:34: En Wij zonden een storm van stenen over hen allen met uitzondering van de familie van Lot, die Wij bij de dageraad verlosten
Danish.verse 54:35: Als een gunst van Ons. Zo belonen Wij hen die dank betuigen
Danish.verse 54:36: En Lot had hen inderdaad voor Onze straf gewaarschuwd doch zij trokken de waarschuwingen in twijfel
Danish.verse 54:37: En zij trachtten hem van zijn gasten af te keren. Daarom verblindden Wij hun ogen en zeiden: Ondergaat nu Mijn straf en Mijn waarschuwing
Danish.verse 54:38: En de volgende morgen vroeg kwam er een blijvende straf over hen
Danish.verse 54:39: Ondergaat nu Mijn straf en Mijn waarschuwing
Danish.verse 54:40: En Wij hebben inderdaad de Koran gemakkelijk gemaakt ter vermaning. Is er iemand die er lering uit trekt
Danish.verse 54:41: Er kwamen ook waarschuwers tot het volk van Pharao
Danish.verse 54:42: Zij verwierpen al Onze tekenen, daarom grepen Wij hen gelijk het grijpen van een krachtige en machtige
Danish.verse 54:43: Zijn uw ongelovigen beter dan dezen? Of zijt gij vrijgesteld in de geschriften
Danish.verse 54:44: Zeggen zij: Wij zijn een overwinnende schare
Danish.verse 54:45: De scharen zullen allen op de vlucht worden gejaagd en zij zullen hun rug tonen
Danish.verse 54:46: Neen, het Uur is hun vastgestelde tijd en het Uur zal uiterst rampzalig en bitter zijn
Danish.verse 54:47: Voorzeker, de overtreders zullen in dwaling verkeren en zich in een vlammend Vuur bevinden
Danish.verse 54:48: De Dag, waarop zij met hun aangezicht in het Vuur zullen worden gesleurd, zal er tot hen worden gezegd: Voelt de aanraking der hel
Danish.verse 54:49: Voorwaar, Wij hebben alles naar maat geschapen
Danish.verse 54:50: En Ons gebod komt in één oogwenk
Danish.verse 54:51: En Wij hebben inderdaad uw gelijken vernietigd. Is er iemand die er lering uit trekt
Danish.verse 54:52: En al hetgeen zij deden staat in de geschriften
Danish.verse 54:53: En alles, groot of klein, is nedergeschreven
Danish.verse 54:54: Voorwaar, de rechtvaardigen zullen te midden van tuinen en rivieren zijn
Danish.verse 54:55: Op de juiste plaats in de tegenwoordigheid van de Almachtige Koning

Dutch.verse 54:1: Het Uur is nabij en de maan is gespleten.
Dutch.verse 54:2: En wanneer zij een Teken zien, dan wenden zij zich af, en zeggen: "Voortdurende toverij."
Dutch.verse 54:3: En zij loochenen en volgen hun begeerten, terwijl alle zaken al zijn vastgesteld.
Dutch.verse 54:4: En voorzeker, er zijn berichten tot hen gekomen waar een afschrikking in is.
Dutch.verse 54:5: Doeltreffende wijsheid, maar de waarschuwingen baten niet.
Dutch.verse 54:6: Keer je daarom van hen af De Dag (zal komen) waarop een oproeper (een Engel) tot iets verschrikkelijks oproept.
Dutch.verse 54:7: Met teneergeslagen blikken komen zij uit de graven tevoorschijn, alsof zij verspreidde sprinkhanen zijn.
Dutch.verse 54:8: Zich haastend naar de oproeper. De ongelovigen zullen zeggen: "Dit is een zware dag."
Dutch.verse 54:9: Vóór hen loochende het volk van Nôeh, zij loochenden Onze dienaar, en zij zeiden: "Een bezetene!" En hij werd verbannen.
Dutch.verse 54:10: Waarop hij zijn Heer aanriep (en zei:) "Ik ben verslagen, help daarom."
Dutch.verse 54:11: Wij openden toen de poorten van de hemel met neergietend water.
Dutch.verse 54:12: En Wij deden bronnen uit de aarde barsten, waarna de wateren elkaar ontmoetten volgens een beschikking die waarlijk bepaald was.
Dutch.verse 54:13: En Wij droegen hem op een vaartuig van planken en (houten) pinnen.
Dutch.verse 54:14: Dat voer onder Ons toezicht, als beloning voor degene die werd verworpen.
Dutch.verse 54:15: En voorzeker, Wij lieten het achter als een teken, is er dan iemand die er lering uit trekt?
Dutch.verse 54:16: En hoe was Mijn bestraffing en Mijn waarschuwing?
Dutch.verse 54:17: En voorzeker, Wij hebben de Koran gemakkelijk gemaakt ter vermaning, is er dan iemand die er lering uit trekt?
Dutch.verse 54:18: (Het volk van) de 'Âd loochende en hoe was Mijn bestraffing en Mijn waarschuwing?
Dutch.verse 54:19: Voorwaar, Wij zonden een verwoestende wind over hen, op een langdurige zwaarmoedige dag.
Dutch.verse 54:20: Die de mensen wegrukte alsof zij ontwortelde palmbomen waren.
Dutch.verse 54:21: Hoe was Mijn bestraffing en Mijn waarschuwing?
Dutch.verse 54:22: En voorzeker, Wij hebben de Koran gemakkelijk gemaakt ter vermaning, is er dan iemand die er lering uit trekt?
Dutch.verse 54:23: (Het volk van) de Tsamôed loochende de waarschuwingen.
Dutch.verse 54:24: En zij zeiden toen: "Zullen wij één mens van ons volgen? Voorwaar, dan zouden wij in dwaling en in een toestand van krankzinnigheid verkeren.
Dutch.verse 54:25: Is de vermaning juist aan hèm onder ons neergezonden, terwijl hij een schaamteloze leugenaar is?"
Dutch.verse 54:26: Zij zullen weten wie de schaamteloze leugenaar is.
Dutch.verse 54:27: Wij zullen de vrouwtjeskameel zenden als een beproeving voor hen, let daarom op hen (O Shâlih) en wees geduldig.
Dutch.verse 54:28: En bericht hun dat het water onder hen (en de kameel) verdeeld moet worden. Ieder een dronk, om de beurt.
Dutch.verse 54:29: Zij riepen toen hun metgezel, die overmoedig werd en (haar) slachtte.
Dutch.verse 54:30: Hoe was toen Mijn bestraffing en Mijn waarschuwing?
Dutch.verse 54:31: Voorwaar, Wij zonden één bliksemslag, waarop zij als dorre takken voor veevoer werden.
Dutch.verse 54:32: En voorzeker, Wij hebben de Koran gemakkelijk gemaakt ter vermaning, is er dan iemand die er lering uit trekt?
Dutch.verse 54:33: Het volk van Lôeth loochende de waarschuwingen.
Dutch.verse 54:34: Voorwaar, Wij zonden vulkanische stenen over hen, behalve over de familie van Lôeth. Wij redden hen in het laatste gedeelte van de nacht.
Dutch.verse 54:35: Als een gunst van Ons. Zo belonen Wij wie dankbaar is.
Dutch.verse 54:36: En voorzeker, Hij (Lôeth) waarschuwde hen voor Onze harde greep, maar zij twijfelden aan de waarschuwingen.
Dutch.verse 54:37: En voorzeker, zij probeerden zijn gasten over te halen (tot hun begeerten), waarop Wij hen blind maakten. (En Allah zei:) "Proeft dan Mijn bestraffing en Mijn waarschuwing."
Dutch.verse 54:38: En voorzeker, een blijvende bestraffing kwam in de ochtend van de volgende dag tot hen.
Dutch.verse 54:39: Proeft dan Mijn bestraffing en Mijn waarschuwing.
Dutch.verse 54:40: En voorzeker, Wij hebben de Koran gemakkelijk gemaakt ter vermaning, is er dan iemand die er lering uit trekt?
Dutch.verse 54:41: En voorzeker, tot Fir'aun kwamen waarschuwingen.
Dutch.verse 54:42: Zij loochenden alle Tekenen van Ons, waarop Wij hen grepen met de greep van een machtige geweldige.
Dutch.verse 54:43: Zijn de ongelovigen onder jullie beter dan diegenen van hen (bovengenoemden), of hebben jullie een vrijbrief in de vroegere Schriften?
Dutch.verse 54:44: Of zeggen zij: "Wij vormen één (groep) die zal overwinnen (van Moehammad)."
Dutch.verse 54:45: De groep zal verslagen worden en zij zullen vluchten.
Dutch.verse 54:46: Nee, het Uur is hun belofte, en het Uur is het verschrikkelijkst en het bitterst.
Dutch.verse 54:47: Voorwaar, de misdadigers verkeren in dwaling en in de Hel.
Dutch.verse 54:48: Op de Dag dat zij naar de Hel gesleept worden op hun gezichten, zal gezegd worden: "Proeft de aanraking van de Hel (Saqar)."
Dutch.verse 54:49: Voorwaar, Wij hebben alle zaken volgens een bepaalde maatgeving geschapen.
Dutch.verse 54:50: En Ons bevel is niets meer dan één Woord, als een oogwenk.
Dutch.verse 54:51: En voorzeker, Wij hebben jullie soortgenoten vernietigd, is er dan iemand die er lering uit trekt?
Dutch.verse 54:52: En alle dingen die zij doen, staan in Schriften.
Dutch.verse 54:53: En al het kleine en het grote is vastgelegd.
Dutch.verse 54:54: Voorwaar, de Moettaqôen verblijven in Tuinen en rivieren (het Paradijs).
Dutch.verse 54:55: In een waarachtige verblijfplaats, bij een machtige Heerser.

English.verse 54:1: The Hour has come near, and the moon has split [in two].
English.verse 54:2: And if they see a miracle, they turn away and say, "Passing magic."
English.verse 54:3: And they denied and followed their inclinations. But for every matter is a [time of] settlement.
English.verse 54:4: And there has already come to them of information that in which there is deterrence -
English.verse 54:5: Extensive wisdom - but warning does not avail [them].
English.verse 54:6: So leave them, [O Muhammad]. The Day the Caller calls to something forbidding,
English.verse 54:7: Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading,
English.verse 54:8: Racing ahead toward the Caller. The disbelievers will say, "This is a difficult Day."
English.verse 54:9: The people of Noah denied before them, and they denied Our servant and said, "A madman," and he was repelled.
English.verse 54:10: So he invoked his Lord, "Indeed, I am overpowered, so help."
English.verse 54:11: Then We opened the gates of the heaven with rain pouring down
English.verse 54:12: And caused the earth to burst with springs, and the waters met for a matter already predestined.
English.verse 54:13: And We carried him on a [construction of] planks and nails,
English.verse 54:14: Sailing under Our observation as reward for he who had been denied.
English.verse 54:15: And We left it as a sign, so is there any who will remember?
English.verse 54:16: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
English.verse 54:17: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
English.verse 54:18: 'Aad denied; and how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
English.verse 54:19: Indeed, We sent upon them a screaming wind on a day of continuous misfortune,
English.verse 54:20: Extracting the people as if they were trunks of palm trees uprooted.
English.verse 54:21: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
English.verse 54:22: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
English.verse 54:24: And said, "Is it one human being among us that we should follow? Indeed, we would then be in error and madness.
English.verse 54:25: Has the message been sent down upon him from among us? Rather, he is an insolent liar."
English.verse 54:26: They will know tomorrow who is the insolent liar.
English.verse 54:27: Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient.
English.verse 54:28: And inform them that the water is shared between them, each [day of] drink attended [by turn].
English.verse 54:29: But they called their companion, and he dared and hamstrung [her].
English.verse 54:30: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
English.verse 54:31: Indeed, We sent upon them one blast from the sky, and they became like the dry twig fragments of an [animal] pen.
English.verse 54:32: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
English.verse 54:33: The people of Lot denied the warning.
English.verse 54:34: Indeed, We sent upon them a storm of stones, except the family of Lot - We saved them before dawn
English.verse 54:35: As favor from us. Thus do We reward he who is grateful.
English.verse 54:36: And he had already warned them of Our assault, but they disputed the warning.
English.verse 54:37: And they had demanded from him his guests, but We obliterated their eyes, [saying], "Taste My punishment and warning."
English.verse 54:38: And there came upon them by morning an abiding punishment.
English.verse 54:39: So taste My punishment and warning.
English.verse 54:40: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
English.verse 54:41: And there certainly came to the people of Pharaoh warning.
English.verse 54:42: They denied Our signs, all of them, so We seized them with a seizure of one Exalted in Might and Perfect in Ability.
English.verse 54:43: Are your disbelievers better than those [former ones], or have you immunity in the scripture?
English.verse 54:44: Or do they say, "We are an assembly supporting [each other]"?
English.verse 54:45: [Their] assembly will be defeated, and they will turn their backs [in retreat].
English.verse 54:46: But the Hour is their appointment [for due punishment], and the Hour is more disastrous and more bitter.
English.verse 54:47: Indeed, the criminals are in error and madness.
English.verse 54:48: The Day they are dragged into the Fire on their faces [it will be said], "Taste the touch of Saqar."
English.verse 54:49: Indeed, all things We created with predestination.
English.verse 54:50: And Our command is but one, like a glance of the eye.
English.verse 54:51: And We have already destroyed your kinds, so is there any who will remember?
English.verse 54:52: And everything they did is in written records.
English.verse 54:53: And every small and great [thing] is inscribed.
English.verse 54:54: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and rivers,
English.verse 54:55: In a seat of honor near a Sovereign, Perfect in Ability.

Filipino.verse 54:1: Ang oras (ng Paghuhukom) ay papalapit na, at ang buwan ay nagbitak sa pagkakalansag (ang mga tao sa Makkah ay humiling kay Propeta Muhammad na magpamalas siya ng Himala, kaya’t ipinakita niya sa kanila ang pagkabiyak ng buwan)
Filipino.verse 54:2: Datapuwa’t kung sila ay nakakamalas ng isang Tanda, sila ay tumatalikod at nagsasabi: “Ito ay pansamantalang salamangka lamang!”
Filipino.verse 54:3: Itinakwil nila (ang Babala, ang Qur’an) at sinunod nila ang kanilang sariling pagnanasa, datapuwa’t ang lahat ng bagay ay mayroong kanyang takdang oras (ayon sa uri ng kanyang mga gawa, para sa mga gumagawa ng kabutihan, ang kanyang gawa ay maghahatid sa kanya sa Paraiso at gayundin naman, ang masamang gawa ay maghahantong sa kanya sa Impiyerno)
Filipino.verse 54:4: At katotohanan na mayroong dumatal sa kanila na mga Tagubilin (ang Qur’an), na rito ay may (sapat na Babala) upang mapaalalahanan sila (sa kasamaan)
Filipino.verse 54:5: Na Hinog na Karunungan (ang Qur’an), datapuwa’t (ang pangaral) ng mga tagapagbabala ay hindi nagbigaysakanilangkapakinabangan
Filipino.verse 54:6: Kaya’tsilaaylayuan mo (o Muhammad). Sa Araw na ang Tagatawag ay tatawag (sa kanila) sa isang kasindak-sindak na pagtitipon
Filipino.verse 54:7: Sila ay magsisilabas at tatambad mula sa kanilang libingan na ang kanilang mata ay nakatungo (sa ibaba) at (namamanhid) na katulad ng mga kulisap na nagsisipangalat
Filipino.verse 54:8: Na nagmamadali, at ang kanilang mga mata ay nakamulagat patungo sa Tagatawag! Ang mga hindi sumasampalataya ay magsasabi: “Napakahirap ng Araw na ito!”
Filipino.verse 54:9: Noong panahong sinauna, ang pamayanan ni Noe ay nagtakwil (sa kanilang Tagapagbalita) at nagtatwa sa Aming alipin at nagsabi: “Narito ang isang inaalihan ng demonyo!” At siya ay walang pakundangan nilang sinalansang at itinaboy
Filipino.verse 54:10: Kaya’t nanikluhod siya sa kanyang Panginoon (na nagsasabi): “Ako ay kanilang kinakayan-kayanan, kaya’t ako ay tulungan (Ninyo)!”
Filipino.verse 54:11: Kaya’t Aming ibinukas ang mga Tarangkahan ng Kalangitan na may mga tubig na bumubuhos
Filipino.verse 54:12: At Aming hinayaan ang kalupaan na madaluyan ng mga dalisdis, upang ang mga tubig (ng kalangitan at kalupaan) ay magpanagpo (at tumaas) sa layunin ng (Aming) pag-uutos
Filipino.verse 54:13: At Aming isinakay sila sa isang (Arko o Barko) na gawa sa malalapad na tablang kahoy na pinatibay ng mga himaymay ng palmera at mga pako
Filipino.verse 54:14: Na lumulutang sa ibabaw ng tubig sa pagsubaybay ng Aming mga Mata, bilang isang gantimpala sa kanya na itinakwil ng may pang-uupasala
Filipino.verse 54:15: At katotohanang hinayaan Namin yaon na maiwan (sa kalupaan) bilang isang Tanda (sa lahat ng panahon); kung gayon, mayroon kayang sinuman ang makakaala-ala (o tatanggap ng tagubilin)
Filipino.verse 54:16: (Pagmasdan) kung gaano (kalagim-lagim) ang Aking Kaparusahan at Aking mga Babala
Filipino.verse 54:17: At katotohanang Aming ginawa ang Qur’an na madaling maunawaan at magunita, kung gayon, mayroon bagang sinuman ang makakaala-ala (o tatanggap ng tagubilin)
Filipino.verse 54:18: Ang mga tribo ni A’ad ay nagpabulaan (sa katotohanan ng kanilang Propetang si Hud, ), kaya’t pagmasdan kung gaano kalagim-lagim ang Aking Kaparusahan at Aking mga Babala
Filipino.verse 54:19: Katotohanang Aming ipinadala sa kanila ang magaspang na tunog ng humahagupit na Hangin, sa Araw ng kasindak-sindak na kasamaan at patuloy na kapinsalaan
Filipino.verse 54:20: Na bumubunot sa mga tao, na wari bang sila ay mga ugat ng punong palmera na hinuhugot (mula sa lupa)
Filipino.verse 54:21: (Kaya’t pagmasdan), kung gaano (kalagim-lagim) ang Aking Kaparusahan at Aking mga Babala
Filipino.verse 54:22: At katotohanang ginawa Namin ang Qur’an na magaan at madaling maintindihan at maala-ala; kung gayon, mayroon bang sinuman ang makakaala-ala (o tatanggap ng tagubilin)
Filipino.verse 54:23: (At gayundin naman), ang tribo ni Thamud ay nagpabulaan din sa mga Babala
Filipino.verse 54:24: Sapagkat sila ay nagsasabi: “Ano! Isang tao! Na isa lamang mula sa ating lipon! Susundin ba namin ang katulad niya? Katotohanan, ang aming kaisipan ay mapapaligaw at kami ay nababaliw!”
Filipino.verse 54:25: Ang Tagubilin ba ay tanging ibinigay lamang sa kanya (sa dinami-dami namin)? Tunay nga, siya ay sinungaling, isang walang galang
Filipino.verse 54:26: Ah! Mapag-aalaman nila sa kinabukasan, kung sino ang sinungaling at walang galang
Filipino.verse 54:27: Sapagkat katotohanang ipapadala Namin sa kanila ang babaeng kamelyo bilang isang pagsubok sa kanila. Kaya’t pagmasdan mo sila (o Saleh) at papanaigin mo sa iyong sarili ang pagtitiyaga
Filipino.verse 54:28: At ipaalam mo sa kanila na ang tubig ay hahatiin sa pagitan (ng babaeng kamelyo) at nila. Ang bawat isa ay may karapatan na uminom at ang bawat pag-inom ay minamatyagan
Filipino.verse 54:29: Datapuwa’t tinawag nila ang kanilang kasamahan at bumunot siya ng (isang espada) at inulos siya (babaeng kamelyo)
Filipino.verse 54:30: Ah! Kung gayon, gaano (kalagim-lagim) ang Aking Kaparusahan at Aking mga Babala
Filipino.verse 54:31: Katotohanang ipinadala Namin sa kanila ang isang Matinding Pagsabog at sila ay natulad sa mga tuyong sanga (at sungot) ng puno na ginagamit bilang pambakod sa kulungan ng hayop
Filipino.verse 54:32: At katotohanan na ginawa Namin na magaan ang Qur’an upang maunawaan at maala-ala. Kaya’t mayroon bang sinuman ang makakaala-ala (o tatanggap ng tagubilin)
Filipino.verse 54:33: Ang pamayanan ni Lut ay nagpabulaan sa mga Babala
Filipino.verse 54:34: Pagmasdan! Katotohanang ipinadala Namin sa kanila ang nagngangalit na Unos ng umuulang bato (na nagwasak sa kanilang lahat), maliban sa mga kasambahay ni Lut, na Aming iniligtas sa pagdatal ng bukang liwayway
Filipino.verse 54:35: Bilang isang Biyaya mula sa Amin; sa gayon Namin ginagantimpalaan ang mga nagbibigay sa Amin ng pasasalamat (sa pamamagitan ng pagsunod sa Amin)
Filipino.verse 54:36: At katotohanang (si Lut) ay nagbabala sa kanila ng Aming Pagsukol (kaparusahan), datapuwa’t sila ay nag- aalinlangan sa mga Babala
Filipino.verse 54:37: At katotohanang sila ay nagnais na hiyain ang kanyang panauhin (sa pamamagitan ng pagsasabi nila na makipagtalik sa kanyang (Lut) mga bisita), datapuwa’t binulag Namin ang kanilang mga mata, (at Kami ay nagwika): “Lasapin ninyo ngayon ang Aking Kaparusahan at Aking mga Babala!”
Filipino.verse 54:38: At katotohanang nang kinaumagahan, ang walang maliw na Kaparusahan ay sumakmal sa kanila
Filipino.verse 54:39: “Kaya’t inyong lasapin ang Aking Kaparusahan at Aking mga Babala.”
Filipino.verse 54:40: At katotohanang ginawa Namin ang Qur’an na magaan upang maunawaan at maala-ala, kaya’t mayroon ba kayang sinuman ang makakaala-ala (o tatanggap ng tagubilin)
Filipino.verse 54:41: At katotohanan, ang mga Babala ay dumatal sa mga tao ni Paraon (sa pamamagitan ni Moises atAaron)
Filipino.verse 54:42: (Ang mga tao) ay nagpabulaan sa lahat ng Aming mga Tanda, kaya’t Aming sinakmal sila ng Kaparusahan na nagmula sa Isang Kataas-taasan sa Kapangyarihan, na nakakapagpatupad ng Kanyang kautusan (walang Hanggang Kapangyarihan)
Filipino.verse 54:43: Ang iyo bang mga tao na walang pananampalataya (o Quraish!) ay higit na mabuti kaysa kanila (mga pamayanan ni Noe, Lut, Salih at mga tao ni Paraon, atbp. na mga winasak)? o sila ba ay ligtas at hindi napapailalim (laban sa Aming Kaparusahan) sa mga Banal na Kasulatan
Filipino.verse 54:44: o sila ba ay nagsasabi: “Kami ay marami sa bilang at kami ay makakapagtanggol ng aming sarili at magtatagumpay”
Filipino.verse 54:45: Hindi magtatagal, ang karamihan sa kanila ay malalagay sa pagtakas, at sila ay tatalilis
Filipino.verse 54:46: Tunay nga! Ang oras (ng Paghuhukom) ay ang Sandali na ipinangako sa kanila (para sa kanilang lubos na kabayaran), at ang oras na yaon ang Pinakamasakit at Pinakamasaklap
Filipino.verse 54:47: Katotohanan, ang Mujrimun (mga makasalanan, mapagsamba sa diyus- diyosan, walang pananalig, kriminal, atbp.) ay nasa kamalian (sa mundong ito) at masusunog (sa Impiyerno sa Kabilang Buhay)
Filipino.verse 54:48: Sa Araw na sila ay hihilahin sa Apoy at ang kanilang mukha ay isusugba sa Apoy (at sa kanila ay ipagsusulit:) “Lasapin ninyo at damhin ang Impiyerno!”
Filipino.verse 54:49: Katotohanang Aming nilikha ang lahat ng bagay sa Qadar (hustong anyo at ganap na sukat, isang maka-diyos na Pagtatakda [pag-uutos] ng lahat ng bagay bago pa ang paglikha sa kanila na katulad nang nakasulat sa Aklat ng mga Pag-uutos – Al Lauh Al Mahfuz
Filipino.verse 54:50: At ang Aming Pag- uutos ay isa lamang, na katulad ng (isang) kurap ng mata
Filipino.verse 54:51: At katotohanang (sa panahong sinauna) ayAming winasak ang mga pangkat na katulad nila, kaya’t mayroon bang sinuman ang makakaala-ala (at tatanggap ng tagubilin)
Filipino.verse 54:52: At ang lahat at bawat isa na kanilang ginawa ay nakatala sa (kanilang) mga Aklat (ng Gawa)
Filipino.verse 54:53: At ang lahat ng mga bagay, maliit man at malaki ay nakatala (sa Al Lauh Al Mahfuz noon pa man, bago pa ito mangyari). [Tunghayan ang Qur’an]
Filipino.verse 54:54: Katotohanan, ang Muttaqun (mga matutuwid at matimtimang tao na umiiwas sa lahat ng kasamaan na Kanyang ipinagbabawal at nagmamahal ng labis kay Allah sa pamamagitan ng paggawa ng mga kabutihan at pagsunod sa lahat ng Kanyang ipinag-uutos), sila ay mananahan sa gitna ng Halamanan at mga Ilog (Paraiso)
Filipino.verse 54:55: Na matatag na nagkakatipon sa Katotohanan (alalaong baga, ang Paraiso), na malapit sa paningin ng Isang Hari na Walang Hanggan sa Kapangyarihan (Allah, ang Pinagpala, ang Kataas-taasan, ang nag-aangkin ng Kamahalan at Karangalan)

French.verse 54:1: L'Heure approche et la Lune s'est fendue.
French.verse 54:2: Et s'ils voient un prodige, ils s'en détournent et disent: «Une magie persistante».
French.verse 54:3: Et ils [le] traitent de mensonge et suivent leurs propres impulsions, or chaque chose arrivera à son terme [et son but].
French.verse 54:4: Ils ont pourtant reçu comme nouvelles de quoi les empêcher (du mal);
French.verse 54:5: [Cela est] une sagesse parfaite. Mais les avertissements ne [leur] servent à rien.
French.verse 54:6: Détourne-toi d'eux. Le jour où l'appeleur appellera vers une chose affreuse,
French.verse 54:7: les regards baissés, ils sortiront des tombes comme des sauterelles éparpillées,
French.verse 54:8: courant, le cou tendu, vers l'appeleur. Les mécréants diront: «Voilà un jour difficile».
French.verse 54:9: Avant eux, le peuple de Noé avait crié au mensonge. Ils traitèrent Notre serviteur de menteur et dirent: «C'est un possédé!» et il fut repoussé.
French.verse 54:10: Il invoqua donc son Seigneur: «Moi, je suis vaincu. Fais triompher (Ta cause)».
French.verse 54:11: Nous ouvrîmes alors les portes du ciel à une eau torrentielle,
French.verse 54:12: et fîmes jaillir la terre en sources. Les eaux se rencontrèrent d'après un ordre qui était déjà décrété dans une chose [faite].
French.verse 54:13: Et Nous le portâmes sur un objet [fait] de planches et de clous [l'arche],
French.verse 54:14: voguant sous Nos yeux: récompense pour celui qu'on avait renié [Noé].
French.verse 54:15: Et Nous la laissâmes, comme un signe [d'avertissement]. Y a-t-il quelqu'un pour réfléchir?
French.verse 54:16: Comment furent Mon châtiment et Mes avertissements?
French.verse 54:17: En effet, Nous avons rendu le Coran facile pour la méditation. Y a-t-il quelqu'un pour réfléchir?
French.verse 54:18: Les 'Aad ont traité de menteur (leur Messager). Comment furent Mon châtiment et Mes avertissements?
French.verse 54:19: Nous avons envoyé contre eux un vent violent et glacial, en un jour néfaste et interminable;
French.verse 54:20: il arrachait les gens comme des souches de palmiers déracinés.
French.verse 54:21: Comment furent Mon châtiment et Mes avertissements?
French.verse 54:22: En effet, Nous avons rendu le Coran facile pour la méditation. Y a-t-il quelqu'un pour réfléchir?
French.verse 54:23: Les Thamûd ont traité de mensonges les avertissements.
French.verse 54:24: Ils dirent: «Allons-nous suivre un seul homme (Sâlih) d'entre nous-mêmes? Nous serions alors dans l'égarement et la folie.
French.verse 54:25: Est-ce que le message a été envoyé à Lui à l'exception de nous tous? C'est plutôt un grand menteur, plein de prétention et d'orgueil».
French.verse 54:26: Demain, ils sauront qui est le grand menteur plein de prétention et d'orgueil.
French.verse 54:27: Nous leur enverrons la chamelle, comme épreuve. Surveille-les donc et sois patient.
French.verse 54:28: Et informe-les que l'eau sera en partage entre eux [et la chamelle]; chacun boira à son tour.
French.verse 54:29: Puis ils appelèrent leur camarade qui prit [son épée] et [la] tua.
French.verse 54:30: Comment furent donc Mon châtiment et Mes avertissements?
French.verse 54:31: Nous lachâmes sur eux un seul Cri, et voilà qu'ils furent réduits à l'état de paille d'étable.
French.verse 54:32: Et vraiment, Nous avons rendu le Coran facile pour la méditation. Y a-t-il quelqu'un pour réfléchir?
French.verse 54:33: Le peuple de Lot traita de mensonges les avertissements.
French.verse 54:34: Nous lachâmes sur eux un ouragan, excepté la famille de Lot que Nous sauvâmes avant l'aube,
French.verse 54:35: à titre de bienfait de Notre part: ainsi récompensons-Nous celui qui est reconnaissant.
French.verse 54:36: Il les avait pourtant avertis de Nos représailles. Mais ils mirent les avertissements en doute.
French.verse 54:37: En effet, ils voulaient séduire ses hôtes. Nous aveuglâmes leurs yeux «Goûtez donc Mon châtiment et Mes avertissements».
French.verse 54:38: En effet, au petit matin, un châtiment persistant les surprit.
French.verse 54:39: Goûtez donc Mon châtiment et Mes avertissements.
French.verse 54:40: Et vraiment, Nous avons rendu le Coran facile pour la méditation. Y a-t-il quelqu'un pour réfléchir?
French.verse 54:41: Les avertissements vinrent certes, aux gens de Pharaon.
French.verse 54:42: Ils traitèrent de mensonges tous Nos prodiges. Nous les saisîmes donc, de la saisie d'un Puissant Omnipotent.
French.verse 54:43: Vos mécréants sont-ils meilleurs que ceux-là? Ou bien y a-t-il dans les Ecritures une immunité pour vous?
French.verse 54:44: Ou bien ils disent: «Nous formons un groupe [fort] et nous vaincrons».
French.verse 54:45: Leur rassemblement sera bientôt mis en déroute, et ils fuiront.
French.verse 54:46: L'Heure, plutôt, sera leur rendez-vous, et l'Heure sera plus terrible et plus amère.
French.verse 54:47: Les criminels sont certes, dans l'égarement et la folie.
French.verse 54:48: Le jour où on les traînera dans le Feu sur leurs visages, (on leur dira): «Goûtez au contact de Saqar [la chaleur brûlante de l'Enfer]».
French.verse 54:49: Nous avons créé toute chose avec mesure,
French.verse 54:50: et Notre ordre est une seule [parole]; [il est prompt] comme un clin d'œil.
French.verse 54:51: En effet, nous avons fait périr des peuples semblables à vous. Y a-t-il quelqu'un pour s'en souvenir?
French.verse 54:52: Et tout ce qu'ils ont fait est mentionné dans les registres,
French.verse 54:53: et tout fait, petit et grand, est consigné.
French.verse 54:54: Les pieux seront dans des Jardins et parmi des ruisseaux,
French.verse 54:55: dans un séjour de vérité, auprès d'un Souverain Omnipotent.

Fulah.verse 54:1: Darngal ngal ɓadike, lewru ndun kadi seekike
Fulah.verse 54:2: Si ɓe yi`ii maande, ɓe ɗuurnoo ɓe wi`a: "Ko mbilewu jokkondirngu
Fulah.verse 54:3: Ɓe fenni, ɓe jokki mbeleeɗe maɓɓe. Hara le huunde kala no mari ñiiɓirde
Fulah.verse 54:4: Gomɗii kumpite arii e maɓɓe, ɗe haɗitorɗum woni e mun
Fulah.verse 54:5: [Ɗum] ko ñeñƴal yottiingal. Kono jertingol ngol nafaali
Fulah.verse 54:6: Selu ɓe. Ñalnde noddoowo on noddoyta e huunde añiniinde
Fulah.verse 54:7: jaasuɓe ndaarɗe, hiɓe yaltira e genaale ɗen wano kanuuji caratooɗi
Fulah.verse 54:8: heñaniiɓe noddoowo on. Heeferɓe ɓen wi`a: "Ndee ko ñalaande sattunde
Fulah.verse 54:9: Ado maɓɓe, yimɓe nuuhu ɓen yedduno. Ɓe fenni jeyaaɗo Amen on, ɓe wi`i : "Ko jinnaaɗo!", o kammbanaa
Fulah.verse 54:10: O torii Joomi makko, wonnde : "Min on ko mi foolaaɗo, faabo [lam]
Fulah.verse 54:11: Men udditiri dammbuɗe kammu ngun, ndiyam wanncoojam
Fulah.verse 54:12: Men fuccitiri leydi ndin ɓulli. Ndiye ɗen fottiri e yamiroore hoddiranoonde
Fulah.verse 54:13: Men roondori mo e [laana] lesaaka marka alluwe e peŋe
Fulah.verse 54:14: hika dogira e ndenka Amen. Ɗum ko njoɓdi [Nuuhu] fennanooɗo on. @Corrected
Fulah.verse 54:15: Gomɗii Men accirii [kon ko Men waɗi ɓe] tasakuyee. Taw si woodi waajitorayɗo
Fulah.verse 54:16: Taskii ko honno lepte Am e jertinol (Am) wa’unoo
Fulah.verse 54:17: Gomɗii Men newinirii Alqur`aanare nden waajitorgol. Hara wooday waajitorɗo
Fulah.verse 54:18: Aadi’en fennuno. Taskee ko honno lepte Am e jertinol (Am) wa’unoo
Fulah.verse 54:19: Men wurtu e maɓɓe henndu sattundu, e ñalaande hiitaande, duumiinde
Fulah.verse 54:20: hindu wippitira yimɓe ɓen, wa si tawii ko ɓe daƴƴe tamaro irtaaɗe
Fulah.verse 54:21: Taskee ko honno lepte Am ɗen e jertinol (Am) ngol wa’unoo
Fulah.verse 54:22: Gomɗii Men newinirii Alqur`aanare nden sabu waajitorgol. Hara wooday waajitorɗo
Fulah.verse 54:24: ɓe wi`i: "Kere ko neɗɗo gooto e amen woni ko men jokkata? Haray men wonii ontuma e nder majjere e tamperere
Fulah.verse 54:25: Hara ko e makko jantoore nden werlaa hakkunde amen? Si ko woni, ko fenoowo nii, townitiiɗo
Fulah.verse 54:26: Aray ɓe annda (Ñalnde) Janngo, ko hommbo woni fenoowo townitiiɗo on
Fulah.verse 54:27: Ko Men wurtirooɓe ngelooba ndewa mbam, jarribagol ɓe. Aynitu ɓe, muññoɗaa
Fulah.verse 54:28: Humpitu ɓe wonnde ndiyam ɗam ko sennndaaɗam hakkunde maɓɓe [e ngelooba mbam]; kala yaray geɓal mun
Fulah.verse 54:29: Ɓe noddi wonndiiɗo maɓɓe, o jonni [kaafa kan], o sodi [mba]
Fulah.verse 54:30: Teskii ko honno lepte Am ɗen e jertinol (Am) ngol wa’unoo
Fulah.verse 54:31: Ko haacaango wooturu tun Men wurti e maɓɓe, ɓe wa’i wa ledde yooruɗe muncaaɗe
Fulah.verse 54:32: Gomɗii Men newinirii Alqur`aanare nden waajitorgol. Hara wooday waajitorɗo
Fulah.verse 54:33: Yimɓe Luutu ɓen fennuno jertine ɗen
Fulah.verse 54:34: Men wurtuno henndu kaaƴe e maɓɓe, si wanaa e ɓeynguure Luutu nden, Men daɗndirno ɓen ka wenndo
Fulah.verse 54:35: moƴƴere immorde e Amen. Ko non Men yoɓitirta kala yettuɗo [neema Allah on]
Fulah.verse 54:36: Gomɗii le o jertinirno ɓe nanngal Amen cattungal ngal. Kono ɓe sikkitii jertinol ngol
Fulah.verse 54:37: Gomɗii ɓe ɗaɓɓirno mo [bonidugol e hoɗɓe makko ɓen]. Men mehi gite maɓɓe ɗen. "Meeɗee lepte ɗen e jertinol Am ngol
Fulah.verse 54:38: Gomɗii ko bimmbi law, woni ko lepte duumiiɗe dawirani ɓe
Fulah.verse 54:40: Gomɗii Men newinirii Alqur`aanare nden waajitorgol. Hara wooday waajitorɗo
Fulah.verse 54:41: Gomɗii jertinaango ngon arii e yimɓe Fir`awna ɓen
Fulah.verse 54:42: Ɓe fenni Aayeeje Amen ɗen fow. Men nanngiri ɓe, nanngal Fooluɗo Hattanɗo
Fulah.verse 54:43: Kere ko heeferɓe mon ɓen ɓuri ɓeya moƴƴude? Kaa ko daɗugol woodani on ka Ɗeri
Fulah.verse 54:44: Kaa hara ɓe wi`ay : "Menen ko men dental wallindirooɓe
Fulah.verse 54:45: Aray nde dental [maɓɓe] ngal foolee, ɓe runntina ɓabbe maɓɓe
Fulah.verse 54:46: Wurin ko Darngal ngal woni kammbaa maɓɓe on, Ko Darngal non ɓuri mawnude e haaɗude
Fulah.verse 54:47: Pellet, bomɓe ɓen wonii e majjere e ooyunge
Fulah.verse 54:48: Ñalnde ɓe daasiroytee geece maɓɓe ɗen ka nder Yiite, (ɓe wi`anee): "Meeɗee meemugol Saqara
Fulah.verse 54:49: Menen Men tagir huunde kala e eɓɓoore
Fulah.verse 54:50: Yamiroore Amen wonaali, si wanaa [konngol] gootol pet, [yaawira] wa hinƴaango yiitere
Fulah.verse 54:51: Gomɗii Men halkiino yeradiiɓe mon. Hara wooday waajitorayɗo
